title: Letter to Alistair Thadden
desc: Professor Xagan writes to his colleague, Alistair Thadden, about the concerning events in Elderath.

title: Gorgona's Origin
desc: A tale of Gorgona, the mad witch of the Misty Island, and her torturer, Elban the Demiurge.

title: Project Desparia
desc: Elban's notes about his project to turn Levania, Elderath's Moon, into Desparia, Ragadam's Domain.

title: Pyramids of the Gods
desc: A journal entry by Elban about the Pyramids of Nirgal.

title: GORLAK WINS!
desc: A boastful note by Gorlak the First Aztrak about the fall of Minaris.
